Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Establishes an intensive addiction and medical services integrated services pilot program
Summary: Establishes an intensive addiction and medical services integrated services pilot program to support two three-year demonstration programs that provide intensive addiction and medical services integrated services to individuals who have significant addiction and medical issues.
LawCode: Add ยง19.18-d, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing an intensive addiction and medical services integrated services pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
